text: I think that this can be really helpful to ensure that certain Corporate Design Criterias are met / being followed.

It can also help bring down the time that is needed to "repair" pages that have been created without the right format ( often this is because the editors lack experience / training to format a page correctly)

yeah i couldn’t upvote it fast enough. there’s an interesting line for HS to walk between “marketers who don’t have a design/dev team are empowered to work on their site” vs. “bigger clients need strict guidelines and tight branding”
